title: Fuckinggg im about to give up with this patch update
body: while im updating the patch I accidentally plug off the socket of my computer then I try to update it again it didnt even continue it get back to 0 percent fuck thisss

replies.body: Ya shut off your AV because our client cant run an update without setting off alarms. We arent Steam or like 95% of the other games out there.

While it's at 0%, the patching process is stuck between either scanning your files or stuck with launching the patching process. I recommend that you configure your client with the proper [**administrative rights**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104), it'd also help if you disabled any antivirus running in the background for the time being.
